formattedAddress: 3 E 52nd St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 3 E 52nd St, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: Longtime restaurant serving time-honored French delicacies in a flower-arrangement-filled space.

originalText.text: Exceptional in every way! The decor makes you believe you’ve been transported to Paris - so many gorgeous fresh flower arrangements, dim lighting, posh red cushy seating, pristine white linen table settings, exquisite French cuisine, impeccable service, and divine presentations - we enjoyed frog legs, oysters, Dover sole, cheese and chocolate soufflés.  Came back another evening for after theatre nightcap in their small elegant bar.  Two tables set up for elegant outside dining, too.

text.text: Exceptional in every way! The decor makes you believe you’ve been transported to Paris - so many gorgeous fresh flower arrangements, dim lighting, posh red cushy seating, pristine white linen table settings, exquisite French cuisine, impeccable service, and divine presentations - we enjoyed frog legs, oysters, Dover sole, cheese and chocolate soufflés.  Came back another evening for after theatre nightcap in their small elegant bar.  Two tables set up for elegant outside dining, too.

originalText.text: Our evening at Le Granule, the crown jewel of New York City’s French dining scene, was nothing short of magical. Hosted by the inimitable Philippe Masson, whose warmth and charisma only added to the ambiance, we were treated to an unforgettable performance that was as much a feast for the senses as the delectable dishes we savored. Philippe’s passion for culinary artistry was evident in every bite, and the service was exemplary and attentive without being intrusive. The decor, with its stunning floral arrangements, created an atmosphere of elegance and charm that perfectly complemented the exquisite meal. An evening at Le Granule is a symphony of flavors, hospitality, and joie de vivre, orchestrated by the talented owner and fantastic performer Philippe Masson

originalText.text: Fairy tale restaurant that leaves you feeling like a princess transported to Europe. They make a mean cosmo and the meal and desert was delicious plus on point service. Can’t wait to go back. Merci.

text.text: Fairy tale restaurant that leaves you feeling like a princess transported to Europe. They make a mean cosmo and the meal and desert was delicious plus on point service. Can’t wait to go back. Merci.

originalText.text: So Tasty!!! 1st class all the way!!! WOW what a great experience.  Dinner was superb, the room is beautiful and very romantic, everyone was dressed to the nines (men be sure to wear a jacket and you will feel most comfortable with a tie, ladies dress to impress).  Lots of famous people were there and the place was packed.  Not an open seat on a Wednesday night.  Be sure to get reservations.  For great apps we suggest the figs with prosciutto which is sliced thicker than in other joints and makes it taste great, also loved the artichoke heart carpaccio (thinly sliced and yummy) with poached qual eggs.  that is a great taste combo.  Also love the smoked salmon blini with caviar which was delicate and flavorful.  For the main courses you cannot go wrong with the HUGE soufflés'.  We had the mushroom which was really good and filling even though it was as light as a cloud.  She had the lobster Raviolis with the Bruere Blanc sauce which is a light white sauce full of flavors.  For dessert you cannot go wrong with any of the soufflés.  We had both the pistachio and the grand Marnier and both was super good.  We also had the Crepes Flamed Orange medallions with Grand Marnier which were very good.  We did not take any food photos because it was a bit too high class for me to be schlepping photos at the table, but I wish I had so you could see how pretty each dish looked.  This place pays attention to the details and that is why it has been one of the city's best restaurants for nearly 60 years.  This is a winner with 2 thumbs way up.    Check out all of our reviews.  If we do not like it we do no review it so all of the ones you see are places that are fantastic.  Follow us if you like.  We had over 7 million views in 2021, over 13 million views in the first 6 months of 2022 and we thank you for that.  We don't get paid, we just love to eat.  Be sure to click on "RobH" at the top of this review to see all of them and to follow us if you like good food and FUN.

originalText.text: Every experience we’ve had here has been nothing short of incredible. The staff is exceptional, the food is great, and the atmosphere is divine. Highly recommend! (Save room for the soufflé - you won’t want to share)
